description:
When booting an instance, the following error occurs on boot up of the image.  This occurs on revision 1495.  The ova includes image.vhd and swap.vhd.  I suspect it's attempting to mount the swap volume which isn't an ext2/3 volume.

2011-08-26 20:52:26,581 DEBUG nova.utils [-] Running cmd (subprocess): sudo mount -t ext2,ext3 /dev/xvdb1 /var/lib/nova/tmp/tmpJthOqB from (pid=5324) execute /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/utils.py:165
2011-08-26 20:52:26,740 DEBUG nova.utils [-] Result was 32 from (pid=5324) execute /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/utils.py:180
2011-08-26 20:52:26,741 INFO nova.virt.xenapi.vm_utils [-] Failed to mount filesystem (expected for non-linux instances): Unexpected error while running command.
Command: sudo mount -t ext2,ext3 /dev/xvdb1 /var/lib/nova/tmp/tmpJthOqB
Exit code: 32
Stdout: ''
Stderr: 'mount: wrong fs type, bad option, bad superblock on /dev/xvdb1,\n       missing codepage or helper program, or other error\n       In some cases useful info is found in syslog - try\n       dmesg | tail  or so\n\n'
2011-08-26 20:52:26,741 DEBUG nova.virt.xenapi.vm_utils [-] Destroying VBD for VDI OpaqueRef:85e9e4cd-52e1-1d65-8db4-a96d7dbd1774 ...  from (pid=5324) with_vdi_attached_here /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py:1061
2011-08-26 20:52:27,579 DEBUG nova.virt.xenapi.vm_utils [-] VBD.unplug successful first time. from (pid=5324) vbd_unplug_with_retry /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py:1076
2011-08-26 20:52:27,622 DEBUG nova.virt.xenapi.vm_utils [-] Destroying VBD for VDI OpaqueRef:85e9e4cd-52e1-1d65-8db4-a96d7dbd1774 done. from (pid=5324) with_vdi_attached_here /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py:1064
title: Failed to mount filesystem xvbd1 in XenServer

comments.content:
When booting an instance, the following error occurs on boot up of the image.  This occurs on revision 1495.  The ova includes image.vhd and swap.vhd.  I suspect it's attempting to mount the swap volume which isn't an ext2/3 volume.

2011-08-26 20:52:26,581 DEBUG nova.utils [-] Running cmd (subprocess): sudo mount -t ext2,ext3 /dev/xvdb1 /var/lib/nova/tmp/tmpJthOqB from (pid=5324) execute /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/utils.py:165
2011-08-26 20:52:26,740 DEBUG nova.utils [-] Result was 32 from (pid=5324) execute /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/utils.py:180
2011-08-26 20:52:26,741 INFO nova.virt.xenapi.vm_utils [-] Failed to mount filesystem (expected for non-linux instances): Unexpected error while running command.
Command: sudo mount -t ext2,ext3 /dev/xvdb1 /var/lib/nova/tmp/tmpJthOqB
Exit code: 32
Stdout: ''
Stderr: 'mount: wrong fs type, bad option, bad superblock on /dev/xvdb1,\n       missing codepage or helper program, or other error\n       In some cases useful info is found in syslog - try\n       dmesg | tail  or so\n\n'
2011-08-26 20:52:26,741 DEBUG nova.virt.xenapi.vm_utils [-] Destroying VBD for VDI OpaqueRef:85e9e4cd-52e1-1d65-8db4-a96d7dbd1774 ...  from (pid=5324) with_vdi_attached_here /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py:1061
2011-08-26 20:52:27,579 DEBUG nova.virt.xenapi.vm_utils [-] VBD.unplug successful first time. from (pid=5324) vbd_unplug_with_retry /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py:1076
2011-08-26 20:52:27,622 DEBUG nova.virt.xenapi.vm_utils [-] Destroying VBD for VDI OpaqueRef:85e9e4cd-52e1-1d65-8db4-a96d7dbd1774 done. from (pid=5324) with_vdi_attached_here /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/xenapi/vm_utils.py:1064
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~antonym

comments.content:
flat_injected was set to True in this case when it should have been False. Since it was True, XenAPI attempted to mount the swap device for injection -- this will obviously fail.

Since we do not use flat_injected, I am going to set this back to Confirmed and let someone who does use it handle the fix and testing.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jk0
